natural resource (such as water or minerals)/resource (such as manpower or tourism)

sentences.english: B. Replan the project without the resources.
sentences.chinese: 跑去資源重新計劃該項目。

sentences.english: Here, the Asia Water Project summarises the arguments.
sentences.chinese: 以下是亞洲水資源項目對該論題的概述。

sentences.english: The recipient will be left with multiple half-open connections that are occupying limited resources.
sentences.chinese: 收件人將留下多個半開連接佔用有限的資源。

sentences.english: Moreover, the relatively high proportion of mature or over-mature forests shows that resources in support are insufficient.
sentences.chinese: 近成過熟林所佔比例較大，後備資源不足。

sentences.english: Changshan archipelago is rich in resources, and the development of coastal economy is very fast.
sentences.chinese: 長山羣島資源豐富，海島經濟發展較快。

sentences.english: We can access educational resources and conduct research wherever there is Wi-Fi.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以在有無線網時搜索教育資源。

sentences.english: It is shown that the potential copper resource in the East Tianshan Mountains is abundant.
sentences.chinese: 預測認爲，東天山地區銅的資源潛力巨大。

sentences.english: Tanshan Town of Yun County is abundant in marble resource.
sentences.chinese: 鄖縣譚山鎮大理石資源豐富。

sentences.english: We will accelerate the development of human resources.
Consider that each resource pool has its own set of registered image templates.
sentences.chinese: 要考慮給每一個資源池指定自己的註冊圖像模板集。

sentences.english: Many natural resources are being overdeveloped.
sentences.chinese: 許多自然資源被過分開發。

sentences.english: Promoted to Year 2 of Higher Diploma in Human Resource Management, Tsing Yi Campus.
sentences.chinese: 升讀青衣分校人力資源管理學高級文憑課程二年級。

sentences.english: Which kind of resources are used in Biomass energy projects?
sentences.chinese: 生物質能項目中會用到哪些資源？

sentences.english: Kelli Kirk is a writer, baker, mom and human resources manager.
sentences.chinese: 凱利柯克是一位作家，麪包師，媽媽和人力資源經理。

sentences.english: The resources of the private sector will also be harnessed by incentivising training through an outcome - based approach.
sentences.chinese: 私營部門的資源也要通過培訓的收入被激勵和利用。

sentences.english: It is imperative, therefore, that they use whatever resources are available and so should be segregated.
sentences.chinese: 因此，必須讓其使用任何可用的資源，並應對其隔離。

definition: to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
innovation/to bring forth new ideas/to blaze new trails
to exploit (a resource)/to open up (for development)/to develop
